short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get yoga poses for every level on your new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your yoga practice with this extension. Get new yoga poses to practice daily at different skill levels. Learn about each pose with a description and its benefits. This extension also features a web search powered by Yahoo!. 

Permissions requested by this extension:
Storage: The storage permission is requested to store the yoga pose images, description and benefits information

Privacy Policy: https://yoganewtab.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://yoganewtab.com/terms-of-service/
Contact Us:  https://yoganewtab.com/contact/
How to Uninstall: https://yoganewtab.com/uninstall.
